item.title: Truncate a table using X++
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn how to truncate large SQL tables efficiently in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations using X++ SqlDataDictionary class. Includes proper permission handling and security considerations.
